quote: I fall for centuries of life. First sunlight touches this hillside; and buried inside the earth, a seed stirs, turning slowly in the deep soil like a tadpole turning itself in a dank pool.
quote_letters: I FALL FOR CENTURIES OF LIFE FIRST SUNLIGHT TOUCHES THIS HILLSIDE AND BURIED INSIDE THE EARTH A SEED STIRS TURNING SLOWLY IN THE DEEP SOIL LIKE A TADPOLE TURNING ITSELF IN A DANK POOL
